author: Madeleine Carlisle
title: ‘This Is a Time for Outrage.’ Angelina Jolie Discusses How Coronavirus Is Harming Children Across the World
description: Jolie spoke with TIME Editor in Chief Edward Edward Felsenthal about how the coronavirus pandemic has harmed children across the world.
content:
While they may be less susceptible to COVID-19, the coronavirus pandemic has had a devastating impact on the world’s children, Angelina Jolie tells TIME Editor in Chief Edward Felsenthal.
